text:
@realDonaldTrump @NYCMayor @NYGovCuomo What are you talking about? Magic =violence.  Thug mentality from the safety of your bunker. 

Governor Cuomo, please don’t listen to this nonsense.  Firing on US citizens is not the way to go. The nation stands with you & your response to Covid-19 has already endeared you to us.
